name: @dtcg/tr
description: Technical reports for the design tokens specification.

scripts.build: pnpm run build:index && pnpm run build:format && pnpm run build:color
scripts.dev:index: pnpm run mkdirs && chokidar "index.html" -c "pnpm run build:index" -d 5000
scripts.dev:format: pnpm run mkdirs && chokidar "format/**/*" -c "pnpm run build:format" -d 5000
scripts.dev:color: pnpm run mkdirs && chokidar "color/**/*" -c "pnpm run build:color" -d 5000
scripts.validate: pnpm run validate:index && pnpm run validate:format
